locs.text: Overrides the API key that is configured in the settings

We encourage responsible use of the chatbot. This uses ChatGPT's API, which is owned by OpenAI. We are not affiliated with them, and this is not an official ChatGPT client. We recommend that you read the terms and conditions of ChatGPT before using the chatbot. You can exit using '/exit'.
There was an error with the Chatbot AI shell:
This chatbot may generate inaccurate responses, so check for facts accordingly.
The last shell is not this shell to detach from.
Write an API key for ChatGPT
Configures the Chatbot AI powered by ChatGPT
Your API key for ChatGPT for access. While you can use the free API key, you can't use advanced models. If you want full access to all paid models, you'll have to pay for the access.
